Overview

Beautiful Summerfield floorplan with all the extras. Home features 4 bedrooms with 3 baths and fireplace! Home offers a great kitchen with upgraded appliances and wood floors throughout. *Days on market is based on start of construction* *Expected completion date April 2024*
